description: A classic barbecue sauce is given a lift with the addition of bourbon, or whisky, for a deep, smoky flavour when grilled.
name: Bourbon & Brown Sugar Bbq Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the chicken under a medium-hot grill for 12-15 minutes on each side, or until cooked through, basting regularly. Alternatively, preheat the oven to 180oC and bake the chicken for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through. Using a clean brush, baste the reserved sauce over the cooked chicken, and serve hot with Boston baked beans, spinach, and sweet corn cobs.
